description:
NetTraffic is a free, simple and lightweight widget-like utility that displays real-time data about the network data usage of your computer.  NetTraffic works with any network connection, of any type and with any selected network interface.  You can view the traffic in a graph that is visible near the system tray icon.  The statistics generated by NetTraffic can be exported.
    
## Key Features
* Network traffic, network monitoring, network data rate (sent / received), network bandwidth, network throughput, network speed meter, network activity, network usage history, network usage predictions.
* Data flow rate (download / upload) - instant view.
* Traffic monitoring, traffic counter, traffic usage, traffic monitor.
* Bandwidth speed, bandwidth monitor, bandwidth usage, bandwidth meter, bandwidth monitoring.
* Link throughput, network interface throughput, connection throughput.
* [Parser HTTP(S)](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_parser_http(s)). Live bandwidth usage monitoring of remote / local devices (routers, modems, hosts with any OS) providing statistics (counters) page over HTTP(S). Optional authentication: Basic, Digest and form based (POST / GET).
* Internet connection speed monitoring, Internet link data rate.
* [Quota counter](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#statistics_quota), data transfer limit usage meter, data plan usage. Feature usable for users with limited Internet connection. In some cases (e.g. mobile Internet) data amount is limited or / and speed over exceeding data limit is limited. Quota counter show usage of data limit and lapse of (billing) period.
* [Usage statistics](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#statistics_chart_traffic), data transfer usage tracking, data meter, data sent, data received, data usage charts.
* Realtime, [real time statistics](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#statistics_general), [real time data rate chart](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#charts_column_frame), live link speed plot, live throughput graph.
* [Network tray icon](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#notify_icon) (network activity indicator), [customizable](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_custom_tray_icon) networking tray icon, classic network tray icon, notify icon.
* [Network interfaces](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#settings_general), adapters, cards, links, connections monitor.
* Tool, software, application.
* [Network utilities](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic_screens#utilities): ping, nslookup, tracert, ipconfig, netstat, route, arp, nbstat, hostname.
* [Multi-language](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic#languages).
* Lightweight.
* [Freeware](https://www.venea.net/web/nettraffic#license), free.

### Install options
  * `/Launch` - Start NetTraffic upon install.
  * `/Autorun` - Set NetTraffic to start on login for all users.
  
###### Example : 
  `choco install nettraffic --params '"/autorun"'`
